Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation IV
Description: The Day 4 Campaign content has been updated. The map now indicates a potential threat along the route. Investigate the area and assess the danger.
QuestDesc: The Day 4 Campaign content has been updated. The map now indicates a potential threat along the route. Investigate the area and assess the danger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This area of the map turned red, {PlayerName}. There's also an increase in reports from the couriers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There might be some kind of threat brewing in the area. I'll leave the investigation to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once you're done, you can also try sending live information to "Lollo Navigator" remotely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't remember Maji ever mentioning them...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm back where I started. And the other statues are gone... I should record this anomaly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember Maji taught me how to transmit data. Let's see here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There... This should do the trick... I think.
